sn55.26:3.1: 26. Paṭhamaanāthapiṇḍikasutta
sn55.26:4.2: Tena kho pana samayena anāthapiṇḍiko gahapati ābādhiko hoti dukkhito bāḷhagilāno.
sn55.26:4.3: Atha kho anāthapiṇḍiko gahapati aññataraṃ purisaṃ āmantesi:
sn55.26:4.4: “ehi tvaṃ, ambho purisa, yenāyasmā sāriputto tenupasaṅkama;
sn55.26:4.5: upasaṅkamitvā mama vacanena āyasmato sāriputtassa pāde sirasā vanda:
sn55.26:4.7: So āyasmato sāriputtassa pāde sirasā vandatī’ti.
sn55.26:4.9: ‘sādhu kira, bhante, āyasmā sāriputto yena anāthapiṇḍikassa gahapatissa nivesanaṃ tenupasaṅkamatu anukampaṃ upādāyā’”ti.
sn55.26:5.1: “Evaṃ, bhante”ti kho so puriso anāthapiṇḍikassa gahapatissa paṭissutvā yenāyasmā sāriputto tenupasaṅkami;
sn55.26:5.2: upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ sāriputtaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
sn55.26:5.3: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho so puriso āyasmantaṃ sāriputtaṃ etadavoca:
sn55.26:6.2: So āyasmato sāriputtassa pāde sirasā vandati.
sn55.26:6.4: ‘sādhu kira, bhante, āyasmā sāriputto yena anāthapiṇḍikassa gahapatissa nivesanaṃ tenupasaṅkamatu anukampaṃ upādāyā’”ti.
sn55.26:7.1: Atha kho āyasmā sāriputto pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya āyasmatā ānandena pacchāsamaṇena yena anāthapiṇḍikassa gahapatissa nivesanaṃ tenupasaṅkami;
sn55.26:7.3: Nisajja kho āyasmā sāriputto anāthapiṇḍikaṃ gahapatiṃ etadavoca:
sn55.26:7.5: Kacci dukkhā vedanā paṭikkamanti, no abhikkamanti;
sn55.26:7.8: Bāḷhā me dukkhā vedanā abhikkamanti, no paṭikkamanti;
sn55.26:8.1: “Yathārūpena kho, gahapati, buddhe appasādena samannāgato assutavā puthujjano kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjati tathārūpo te buddhe appasādo natthi.
sn55.26:8.2: Atthi ca kho te, gahapati, buddhe aveccappasādo—
sn55.26:8.5: Tañca pana te buddhe aveccappasādaṃ attani samanupassato ṭhānaso vedanā paṭippassambheyya.
sn55.26:9.1: Yathārūpena kho, gahapati, dhamme appasādena samannāgato assutavā puthujjano kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjati, tathārūpo te dhamme appasādo natthi.
sn55.26:9.2: Atthi ca kho te, gahapati, dhamme aveccappasādo—
sn55.26:9.5: Tañca pana te dhamme aveccappasādaṃ attani samanupassato ṭhānaso vedanā paṭippassambheyya.
sn55.26:10.1: Yathārūpena kho, gahapati, saṅghe appasādena samannāgato assutavā puthujjano kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjati, tathārūpo te saṅghe appasādo natthi.
sn55.26:10.2: Atthi ca kho te, gahapati, saṅghe aveccappasādo—
sn55.26:10.5: Tañca pana te saṅghe aveccappasādaṃ attani samanupassato ṭhānaso vedanā paṭippassambheyya.
sn55.26:11.1: Yathārūpena kho, gahapati, dussīlyena samannāgato assutavā puthujjano kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjati, tathārūpaṃ te dussīlyaṃ natthi.
sn55.26:11.2: Atthi ca kho te, gahapati, ariyakantāni sīlāni … pe …
sn55.26:11.4: Tāni ca pana te ariyakantāni sīlāni attani samanupassato ṭhānaso vedanā paṭippassambheyya.
sn55.26:12.1: Yathārūpāya kho, gahapati, micchādiṭṭhiyā samannāgato assutavā puthujjano kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjati, tathārūpā te micchādiṭṭhi natthi.
sn55.26:12.2: Atthi ca kho te, gahapati, sammādiṭṭhi.
sn55.26:12.3: Tañca pana te sammādiṭṭhiṃ attani samanupassato ṭhānaso vedanā paṭippassambheyya.
sn55.26:13.1: Yathārūpena kho, gahapati, micchāsaṅkappena samannāgato assutavā puthujjano kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjati, tathārūpo te micchāsaṅkappo natthi.
sn55.26:13.2: Atthi ca kho te, gahapati, sammāsaṅkappo.
sn55.26:13.3: Tañca pana te sammāsaṅkappaṃ attani samanupassato ṭhānaso vedanā paṭippassambheyya.
sn55.26:14.1: Yathārūpāya kho, gahapati, micchāvācāya samannāgato assutavā puthujjano kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjati, tathārūpā te micchāvācā natthi.
sn55.26:14.2: Atthi ca kho te, gahapati, sammāvācā.
sn55.26:14.3: Tañca pana te sammāvācaṃ attani samanupassato ṭhānaso vedanā paṭippassambheyya.
sn55.26:15.1: Yathārūpena kho, gahapati, micchākammantena samannāgato assutavā puthujjano kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjati, tathārūpo te micchākammanto natthi.
sn55.26:15.2: Atthi ca kho te, gahapati, sammākammanto.
sn55.26:15.3: Tañca pana te sammākammantaṃ attani samanupassato ṭhānaso vedanā paṭippassambheyya.
sn55.26:16.1: Yathārūpena kho, gahapati, micchāājīvena samannāgato assutavā puthujjano kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjati, tathārūpo te micchāājīvo natthi.
sn55.26:16.2: Atthi ca kho te, gahapati, sammāājīvo.
sn55.26:16.3: Tañca pana te sammāājīvaṃ attani samanupassato ṭhānaso vedanā paṭippassambheyya.
sn55.26:17.1: Yathārūpena kho, gahapati, micchāvāyāmena samannāgato assutavā puthujjano kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjati, tathārūpo te micchāvāyāmo natthi.
sn55.26:17.2: Atthi ca kho te, gahapati, sammāvāyāmo.
sn55.26:17.3: Tañca pana te sammāvāyāmaṃ attani samanupassato ṭhānaso vedanā paṭippassambheyya.
sn55.26:18.1: Yathārūpāya kho, gahapati, micchāsatiyā samannāgato assutavā puthujjano kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjati, tathārūpā te micchāsati natthi.
sn55.26:18.2: Atthi ca kho te, gahapati, sammāsati.
sn55.26:18.3: Tañca pana te sammāsatiṃ attani samanupassato ṭhānaso vedanā paṭippassambheyya.
sn55.26:19.1: Yathārūpena kho, gahapati, micchāsamādhinā samannāgato assutavā puthujjano kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjati, tathārūpo te micchāsamādhi natthi.
sn55.26:19.2: Atthi ca kho te, gahapati, sammāsamādhi.
sn55.26:19.3: Tañca pana te sammāsamādhiṃ attani samanupassato ṭhānaso vedanā paṭippassambheyya.
sn55.26:20.1: Yathārūpena kho, gahapati, micchāñāṇena samannāgato assutavā puthujjano kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjati, tathārūpaṃ te micchāñāṇaṃ natthi.
sn55.26:20.2: Atthi ca kho te, gahapati, sammāñāṇaṃ.
sn55.26:20.3: Tañca pana te sammāñāṇaṃ attani samanupassato ṭhānaso vedanā paṭippassambheyya.
sn55.26:21.1: Yathārūpāya kho, gahapati, micchāvimuttiyā samannāgato assutavā puthujjano kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjati, tathārūpā te micchāvimutti natthi.
sn55.26:21.2: Atthi ca kho te, gahapati, sammāvimutti.
sn55.26:21.3: Tañca pana te sammāvimuttiṃ attani samanupassato ṭhānaso vedanā paṭippassambheyyā”ti.
sn55.26:22.1: Atha kho anāthapiṇḍikassa gahapatissa ṭhānaso vedanā paṭippassambhiṃsu.
sn55.26:22.2: Atha kho anāthapiṇḍiko gahapati āyasmantañca sāriputtaṃ āyasmantañca ānandaṃ sakeneva thālipākena parivisi.
sn55.26:22.3: Atha kho anāthapiṇḍiko gahapati āyasmantaṃ sāriputtaṃ bhuttāviṃ onītapattapāṇiṃ aññataraṃ nīcāsanaṃ gahetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
sn55.26:22.4: Ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho anāthapiṇḍikaṃ gahapatiṃ āyasmā sāriputto imāhi gāthāhi anumodi:
sn55.26:23.1: * “Yassa saddhā tathāgate,
sn55.26:24.3: Adaliddoti taṃ āhu,
sn55.26:26.1: Atha kho āyasmā sāriputto anāthapiṇḍikaṃ gahapatiṃ imāhi gāthāhi anumoditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi.
sn55.26:27.1: Atha kho āyasmā ānando yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn55.26:27.3: Ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ bhagavā etadavoca:
sn55.26:27.4: “handa kuto nu tvaṃ, ānanda, āgacchasi divādivassā”ti?
sn55.26:27.5: “Āyasmatā, bhante, sāriputtena anāthapiṇḍiko gahapati iminā ca iminā ca ovādena ovadito”ti.
sn55.26:27.7: mahāpañño, ānanda, sāriputto, yatra hi nāma cattāri sotāpattiyaṅgāni dasahākārehi vibhajissatī”ti.
